reviewText:
A rollicking, foot-stomping, puppet-performed country music Thanksgiving special. Country music star Billy Joe Bigbeak presents a "Salute to the Turkey, " but runs afoul when his guest of honor, the turkey, doesn't show.
In "SALUTE TO THE TURKEY," Billy Joe Bigbeak and his All Bird Band present a rousing country Thanksgiving variety show complete with puppet-operated banjo, fiddle, and bass. "A GIFT FOR GRANNY" finds a cast of Gigglesnort Hotel regulars teaching the spirit of Christmas giving though their own adventuresome foibles.
